snippet: Men armed with knives broke into the Convent of Jesus and Mary in Ranaghat and stole about $9,000 in cash and valuables, a police official said. One of them raped the nun, the Catholic archbishop of Kolkata said.
abstract: Elderly nun is raped during robbery of convent school in West Bengal, India; thieves made off with about $9,000 in cash and valuables.
lead_paragraph: Men armed with knives broke into the Convent of Jesus and Mary in Ranaghat and stole about $9,000 in cash and valuables, a police official said. One of them raped the nun, the Catholic archbishop of Kolkata said.

headline.main: Nun Raped During Robbery at Convent School in India
headline.print_headline: Nun Raped During Robbery at Convent School in India
